{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCWBR14S-N |revision=3 |asin |price=35 |fcc_date=07/20/2009 |is_manuf=No |manuf=AWB |manuf_model=WG6205 |manuf_rev=-17 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V8YFIU176205000W,V8YSMCWBR14SN3 |pcb_id=141000000000W |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=fixed non-removable |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Accton UBoot v3.2.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui=00:22:2D |oui_eth=00:22:2D }} {{TagLine|Barricade N 300Mbps Wireless Broadband Router}} :[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&localeCode=EN_USA&cid=5&scid=118&pid=1693 Product page (US)] {{â€¢}} [http://www.smc.com/files/AF/UG_SMCWBR14S-N3.pdf Manual]
"P/N: 141000000000W REV: R0B" is silkscreened on the board. :The default SSID is, according to the manual, ''[[SMC]]''.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/smc/smcwbr14s-n3 ''SMC SMCWBR14S-N3'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :1x WAN, 4x LAN ports - [[Accton]] WG6205-17 ([[AWB]])
Same board as: *[[SMC SMCWEBS-N]] - without the WAN port *[[SMC SMCWBR14S-3GN]] - with the USB port for 3G use
